item.title: 2. Add Two Numbers
item.description: add-two-numbers Explain You are given two non-empty linked lists representing two non-negative integers. The digits are stored in reverse order and each of their nodes contain a single digit. Add the two numbers and return it as a linked list. You may assume the two numbers do not contain any leading zero, except the number 0 itself. Example Input: (2 -> 4 -> 3) + (5 -> 6 -> 4)
